title: Margot Robbie Loves a Funny TV Show
summary: Margot Robbie is a famous actress from Australia. She loves a TV show called Gavin & Stacey. This show is a comedy from the BBC. It is about two families and their friends. Margot Robbie says it is the best show ever because it makes her happy. She watched the last episode twice. She even talked about it with another star, Bette Midler. The show is set in Wales and has funny characters. Many people watched the finale on Christmas Day. Margot Robbie is in a new movie, but she still loves this TV show. She shared DVDs of the show with Bette Midler. The house from the show is for sale now. The show brings joy to many fans.

keywords.explanation: a woman who acts in movies or TV shows
a funny show or movie that makes people laugh
the last episode of a TV show
a country in the United Kingdom where part of the show is set
discs that store movies or TV shows to watch
people who really like a show or star

questions.question: What TV show does Margot Robbie love?
Why does Margot Robbie like the show?
How many times did she watch the finale?
Who did she talk to about the show?
Where is the show partly set?

background_read: Margot Robbie is a famous actress known for movies. Gavin & Stacey is a popular British TV comedy that started in 2007. It follows the lives of two families from different towns. The show has many funny moments and lovable characters. It ended with a special finale that many people watched. TV shows can bring people together and make them laugh. Fans often share their favorite shows with friends.
Article_Structure: WHO: Margot Robbie, a famous actress from Australia
WHAT: She loves the TV show Gavin & Stacey and calls it the best show ever
WHERE: The show is partly set in Wales, and she talked about it on a podcast
WHY: Because the show makes her happy and she enjoys sharing it with others

perspectives.description: Margot Robbie shows how fans can be passionate about TV shows and share them with others.
